name: Parkinson's in Motion
description: Premier Parkinson's Disease resource group providing support, education, and advocacy for individuals and families impacted by Parkinson's Disease in Eastern Kentucky and the Appalachian region. Offers monthly meetings, educational programs, exercise classes, and connects people with tools and resources.
source: Verified from official website and multiple authoritative sources
hours_of_operation: Contact for current hours and meeting schedules
eligibility_requirements: Open to individuals and families impacted by Parkinson's Disease
populations_served: Individuals with Parkinson's Disease, families, caregivers, healthcare professionals
cost_information: Free services and programs, donations accepted
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official website https://parkinsonsinmotion.org/contact/. Organization details verified from main website https://parkinsonsinmotion.org. Phone number (859) 338-7430 confirmed working. Address 195 Commercial Drive, Suite 104, London, KY 40744 verified on Google Maps and official website. Executive Director Jane Rice Williams confirmed via LinkedIn and multiple sources. Organization is 501(c)(3) nonprofit serving Eastern Kentucky and Appalachian region. Services include support groups, educational programs, advocacy, and resource connections. All information cross-referenced with Google search results, Facebook page, and Parkinson's Foundation listings for consistency.
